changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: create sequence match_seq start with 10000 increment by 50

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table match add price_type varchar(6 char)

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: update match set match_type = 'GROUP_MATCH' where type_match = 12

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: update match set price_type = 'TOP' where type_match in (2,3)

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: update match set price_type = 'NORMAL' where type_match = 1

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table match drop column type_match
